trend_summary: Across the time-series the village core along the east-west road stays intact while only a handful of new houses and one red-roofed commercial block appear. Surrounding land remains mostly agricultural; fields cycle through pasture, plough and regrowth. A new pond emerges north-west and endures. Built-up growth is limited and dispersed.
notable_changes: Red-roofed commercial building added beside the main road mid-period.
2â€“3 small residential infill lots constructed along the village street.
Formation and persistence of a water pond/wetland north-west of the centre.
Western and southern fields rotate from pasture to tilled cropland then back to green cover.
